body:
Comment 2 by **hsmyers**: 
Confusion over 'what it wanted' was caused by it not occurring to me that
the problem was as simple as you point out :) Regards heavy load, running
one terminal session and one browser session. No emulation that I know
of---that said, there are several ways to install Ubuntu and I may not have
selected the full bore give me the whole thing choice. I'll investigate. In
preliminary work thus far, everything seems work and work well, so I'll
treat this as a kind of warning and proceed. Thanks for the information!

--hsm
